p: A previous study also highlighted the AC of ethanolic spruce bark extracts obtained by UAE, tested with the ABTS reagent [ 54]; however, no studies measuring the AC of spruce bark extracts obtained by MAE with the ABTS assay, were found. For both assays (DPPH and ABTS), the results of this study and those of the baseline studies, could not be directly compared because of the different methodologies used and the different ways to express the final results.
